name: _actiongame
description:
Control the most powerful creature in the whole multiverse! Yes, you heard me right. In _actiongame, you get to control Slimey, the ultimate, final achievement of all human science, capable of infinite destruction and creation alike!.. However, fret not. You aren´t expected to control the entire creature´s above-infinite power set -- not yet, at least. Instead, for this first level, you shall only need to utilize his vast power to control the world around him to do one thing - Jump.

 To do this, we were able to develop and spread Input Boxes around each testing facility of _actiongame, each one connecting you, the player, to a fraction of Slimey´s godly powers. And so, merely link one of these Input Boxes to whatever object, force or ""threat"" is in Slimey´s way - and, boom, at your will, Slimey will have made whatever you ordered to come true. If you order an entire galaxy to jump, then, no matter the what the so-called 'laws of physics' say, Slimey will laugh at that pretentiousness and confer onto that galaxy the skill to jump. He will make whatever you ordered come true. 

So far, we´ll allow you to have access to the first level, comprising two testing facilities. Enjoy.
